nodes.text: This hospital was located on the planet Bandomeer. The healer Serra, daughter of Caleb, worked in the hospital as a nurse for a time. In 987 BBY, after a failed attempt to capture an InterGalactic Banking Clan officer, Salto Zendar came to the hospital to receive treatment for his wounds. However, the Banking Clan put a large bounty on his head, and several bounty hunters soon arrived to try to take him into custody. During the ensuing skirmish, Zendar was killed, along with several bounty hunters, hospital staff, and nurses. However, one of the bounty hutners, Lucia, was saved by Serra, and Lucia vowed to become Serra's bodyguard.
